definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="i">i</variable><variable type="Number" id="j">j</variable><variable type="String" id="tag">tag</variable><variable type="MCItem" id="tempItem">tempItem</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:stat_initialised</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="call_procedure_at"><field name="procedure">InitialiseFlame</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure_at"><field name="procedure">InitialiseHeart</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:stat_initialised</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
